resources.string: Balance is required by federal law (US Patriot Act) to collect your Social Security Number.
For more information ask our superhero up top ^
Your information is encrypted and securely transmitted using SSL
US federal law requires all financial advisors to collect this information
US federal law requires Balance to collect this information to help prevent money laundering

That\'s it, you\'re all verified. Continue on forward to choose what values are most important to you and set your risk tolerance. Remember, at Balance we only invest your money in socially responsible investments that align with your values.
Superhero Tip: You can rearrange your value order at anytime
Drag to place in order. Values at the top will be considered first when selecting your investments.
Connect your bank account so we can auto-round up your purchases.

Select what type of investments fit your goals. Conservative styles will typically have lower earnings but more stability. Aggressive styles tend to have higher earnings but are less stable. Remember, with great power comes great responsibility. Choose wisely.
